ivardefs.name: compareToSourceExpression
ivardefs.desc: The FHIRPath expression to evaluate against the source fixture. When compareToSourceId is defined, either compareToSourceExpression or compareToSourcePath must be defined, but not both.

ivardefs.name: compareToSourceId
ivardefs.desc: Id of the source fixture used as the contents to be evaluated by either the "source/expression" or "sourceId/path" definition.

ivardefs.name: compareToSourcePath
ivardefs.desc: XPath or JSONPath expression to evaluate against the source fixture. When compareToSourceId is defined, either compareToSourceExpression or compareToSourcePath must be defined, but not both.

ivardefs.name: contentType
ivardefs.desc: The mime-type contents to compare against the request or response message 'Content-Type' header.

ivardefs.name: description
ivardefs.desc: The description would be used by test engines for tracking and reporting purposes.

ivardefs.name: direction
ivardefs.desc: The direction to use for the assertion.

ivardefs.name: expression
ivardefs.desc: The FHIRPath expression to be evaluated against the request or response message contents - HTTP headers and payload.

ivardefs.name: headerField
ivardefs.desc: The HTTP header field name e.g. 'Location'.

ivardefs.name: label
ivardefs.desc: The label would be used for tracking/logging purposes by test engines.

ivardefs.name: minimumId
ivardefs.desc: The ID of a fixture.  Asserts that the response contains at a minimum the fixture specified by minimumId.

ivardefs.name: navigationLinks
ivardefs.desc: Whether or not the test execution performs validation on the bundle navigation links.

ivardefs.name: operator
ivardefs.desc: The operator type defines the conditional behavior of the assert. If not defined, the default is equals.

ivardefs.name: path
ivardefs.desc: The XPath or JSONPath expression to be evaluated against the fixture representing the response received from server.

ivardefs.name: requestMethod
ivardefs.desc: The request method or HTTP operation code to compare against that used by the client system under test.

ivardefs.name: requestURL
ivardefs.desc: The value to use in a comparison against the request URL path string.

ivardefs.name: resource
ivardefs.desc: The type of the resource.  See http://build.fhir.org/resourcelist.html.

ivardefs.name: response
ivardefs.desc: okay | created | noContent | notModified | bad | forbidden | notFound | methodNotAllowed | conflict | gone | preconditionFailed | unprocessable.

ivardefs.name: responseCode
ivardefs.desc: The value of the HTTP response code to be tested.

ivardefs.name: sourceId
ivardefs.desc: Fixture to evaluate the XPath/JSONPath expression or the headerField  against.

ivardefs.name: validateProfileId
ivardefs.desc: The ID of the Profile to validate against.

ivardefs.name: value
ivardefs.desc: The value to compare to.

ivardefs.name: warningOnly
ivardefs.desc: Whether or not the test execution will produce a warning only on error for this assert.

properties.desc: Evaluates the results of previous operations to determine if the server under test behaves appropriately.
